ygData.msgSnippet: So, I have read Richardson and Ruby s RESTful Web Services . The book is great for the foundational rationale of REST. But, when it comes to implementations,

So, I have read Richardson and Ruby's "RESTful Web Services". The book is g=
reat for the foundational rationale of REST. But, when it comes to implemen=
tations, there were RESTlet when it comes to the Java world.

I looked arou=
nd and there are these:
1) RESTlet
2) Apache CFX
3) Oracle/Sun Glassfish (J=
ersey)

So, here are the questions:
a) Are there others that are worth look=
ing at?
b) If you have a brand new project, which one would you use and why=
?
